name: Dinosaur Memory Game For Kids
description:
Dinosaur Memory is a Dinosaur-theme Memory Game that provides wholesome fun for the kids and the whole family.

1) Support single and up to 4 Multi-player
2) 3D Animated Dinosaur Mode
3) Cute Dino Sticker Mode
4) Dino stamp mode
5) Carnivorous Dino Mode
6) Support different level of difficulty
7) Plus an interactive Dino Safari to manage your 3D Dinos
